sentences.en: A statement that twists fact ; a misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 对事实和数据的详细陈述.

sentences.en: Examples of void contracts are those entered as a result misrepresentation, duress or undue influence.
sentences.cn: 因欺诈 、 胁迫和乘人之危而签订的合同属于可撤销合同.

sentences.en: Examples of void contracts are those entered as a result of misrepresentation, duress or undue influence.
sentences.cn: 因欺诈 、 迫和乘人之危而签订的合同属于可撤销合同.

sentences.en: He now wants to sue the magazine for misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 现在他想以误导为由起诉那家杂志.

sentences.en: I never saw such a glaring example of misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过像这样明目张胆地歪曲事实。

sentences.en: I understand any misrepresentation may cause denial of admission or expulsion from the university.
sentences.cn: 我明白任何误写都有可能遭到拒绝入学或开除学籍.

sentences.en: I understand that UK may consider taking separate legal actions against me for any such misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 贵校另得依法律追究法律责任.

sentences.en: The pro-gramme's researchers are guilty of bias and misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 该项目的研究者们对心存偏见和误解感到非常内疚。

sentences.en: This Policy shall be voidable misrepresentation , misdescription or non - disclosure in any material particular.
sentences.cn: 被保险人如伪报 、 误报或隐瞒任何重要细节,本保险单应予无效.

sentences.en: This was a misrepresentation of the truth.
To avoid misrepresentation, we have moved to a new URL.
sentences.cn: 为了避免误会, 本网址将移至新网址.

words.tran_cn: 歪曲，误传；不合适地代表
